body:
Available soon!

Features and Enhancements

Healthcare Facilities
  • Healthcare Facilities - Provider Type has been added as filter criteria in Network360.li>
  • As with any other Provider Type, Healthcare Facilities functionality is driven by specialty mappings.
  • Criteria options include:
    • Provider Type: Healthcare Facility - Provider Type
    • Specialty: Ambulatory Surgical Center, Diagnostic Imaging, Infusion / IV Services, Skilled Nursing Facility, and more.
  • Criteria options available wherever Specialties can be selected:
    • Create a List
    • Recruitment
    • Look up a Provider
    • Competitive Access (in Accessibility Specifications)
    • Network Modeling
  • Providers and Provider Locations can be tagged.
